Jokowi Kesal Bunga Kredit Bank Nggak Turun-turun
06 Nov 2019, 05:48 by Hendra Kusuma


Foto: (Dok Biro Pers Setpres).

Jakarta - Presiden Joko Widodo (Jokowi) meminta perbankan nasional untuk serius menurunkan suku bunga kredit. Pasalnya, bunga acuan Bank Indonesia (BI) sudah berkali-kali turun.Hal itu diungkapkannya di depan para bankir saat membuka acara Indonesia Banking Expo 2019 di Hotel Fairmont, Jakarta Selatan."Saya mengajak untuk memikirkan serius menurunkan suku bunga kredit," kata Jokowi, Jakarta, Rabu (6/11/2019).Jokowi bilang, perbankan di negara lain sudah banyak yang menurunkan suku bunga kredit perbankannya. Hal itu sebagai tindak lanjut bank sentral negara lain yang menurunkan suku bunga acuannya.Menurut Jokowi, bank sentral juga sudah beberapa kali menurunkan suku bunga acuan BI 7 days reverse repo rate sebanyak 100 basis poin (bps) menjadi 5%.Dengan langkah tersebut, Mantan Wali Kota Solo ini menilai harus segera ditindaklanjuti oleh perbankan nasional dengan juga menurunkan bunga kredit."Masa negara lain sudah turun, turun, turun, kita BI rate sudah turun, banknya belum. Saya tunggu. Tepuk tangan berarti setuju, catat lagi," ungkap Jokowi.Simak Video "Hati-hati! Uang Mahar Nikah Jangan Dilipat"[Gambas:Video 20detik](hek/ang)

Jokowi Upset Bank Credit Not Down and Down
Nov 6, 2019, 05:48 by Hendra Kusuma


Photo: (Dok Setpres Press Bureau).

Jakarta - President Joko Widodo (Jokowi) asks national banks to seriously reduce lending rates. This is because the Bank Indonesia (BI) benchmark rate has repeatedly dropped. This was revealed in front of the bankers when opening the Indonesia Banking Expo 2019 at the Fairmont Hotel, South Jakarta. "I invite to think seriously about lowering lending rates," Jokowi said , Jakarta, Wednesday (11/06/2019). Jokowi said that banks in other countries had lowered their bank loan interest rates. This was a follow-up to the central banks of other countries which lowered their benchmark interest rates. According to Jokowi, the central bank had also several times reduced the benchmark BI 7 days reverse repo rate by 100 basis points (bps) to 5%. With this step, the former The Mayor of Solo assessed that it must be immediately followed up by national banks by also lowering credit interest. "The period of other countries has gone down, down, down, we BI rate has gone down, the bank has not. I am waiting. Applause means agree, record again," said Jokowi.Simak Video "Be careful!
